info.description: Production-ready blog backend API for Alfafaa Community - a Muslim community blogging platform.
info.title: Alfafaa Blog API

get.description: Get a paginated list of published articles (editors can see all)

post.description: Create a new article (requires author role or higher)

get.description: Get the most recently published articles
Get articles sorted by view count

put.description: Update an article (authors can only update their own, editors can update any)

delete.description: Delete an article (authors can only delete their own, editors can delete any)

get.description: Get a single article by its slug (increments view count for non-authenticated users)
Get articles related to a specific article based on categories and tags

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT tokens
Logout the current user (client should discard tokens)

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's profile

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get all categories (optionally in hierarchical structure)

post.description: Create a new category (requires editor role)

get.description: Get a single category by its slug
Get a paginated list of articles in a category
Get a paginated list of all media files (admin only)

post.description: Upload a file (image only, requires authentication)

400.description: No file provided or invalid file type

get.description: Get a single media file info by its ID

delete.description: Delete a media file (owner or admin only)

get.description: Search across articles, categories, and tags
Get a paginated list of all tags

post.description: Create a new tag (requires editor role)

get.description: Get the most used tags sorted by usage count
Get a single tag by its slug
Get a paginated list of articles with a specific tag
Get a paginated list of users (requires editor or admin role)
Get a user's public profile by their ID

put.description: Update a user's profile (users can only update their own profile unless admin)

403.description: Forbidden - can only update own profile

put.description: Update any user's profile including role and status (admin only)

get.description: Get a paginated list of published articles by a user

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
